description:
The Culture Festival draws near. While the cosplay club decides to showcase outfits, Subaru decides to create a simple planetarium for the Astronomy club. Subaru was the only member of the club, but with Minato helping her out, things were proceeding smoothly. Seeing the nice atmosphere between Subaru and Minato, Hikaru and the others secretly plot to enter the two of them into the Culture Festival`s Couple Contest.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: プラネタリウムランデブー
